Name: Artillery Globe
About the game: Claim the entirety of the planet with real-time missile based combat. Build structures and new technology to strategically take control of all the planets resources. Build Surveillance : Intercept radio signals to gain an edge on you opponent. Defend Your cause : Build force fields to protect yourself from enemy onslaught. Control The sky : Launch satellites to take gain tactical information of the planet. Break any Defense : Execute strategically timed attacks to overwhelm your opponent. Build ultimate weapons : Take control of resources to build doomsday weapons.
